Articles.Content:
Im not exactly good with creating names.

For this series I'll be following the tutorial's on the KSP Wiki here:

I've also been making mission patches for each of my missions.

Edited July 23, 2014 by Commander Jebidiah

First Mission Stayputnik 1 or as known in our universe Sputnik 1

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Goals: Reach a stable orbit

Must have enough battery for one orbit

Report: The mission went as planned and Stayputnik 1 ended up in a 165x75 km orbit the battery lasted for 1 3/4 orbits.

Edited July 23, 2014 by Commander Jebidiah
Ah Fleet's Rival its nice to get a compliment from one of the most impressive builders on the forums

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Report;

Crew: Jeb Kerman

Status: Success/Landed

Notes: Kostok 1 launched from KSC at 1600 hours 24/07/14 and lasted 43 minutes.

Jebidiah said there were strange lights in space but officials say he was just looking at the stars.
